main event: Two Air Force officers sighted an unidentified object hovering at 7,500 feet near Meridian, Mississippi for over an hour before it suddenly accelerated and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light, larger than a typical aircraft.
The object hovered in place for over an hour before rapidly accelerating and disappearing.
The sighting was investigated by Air Force personnel, but they were unable to determine the nature of the object.
A separate report describes the sighting of a bright light at 7,300 feet that was observed for 13 minutes with no sound or exhaust.
The reports indicate that ground radar confirmed the presence of the unidentified objects.
sighted object: bright light, larger than a typical aircraft
